format.format:
> [!query]- Sous-notes de {{VALUE}}
> ```dataview
> TABLE up as "Up", up.up as "2-Up", up.up.up as "3-Up", up.up.up.up as "4-Up"
> FROM ""
> WHERE contains(file.outlinks, {{VALUE}})
>    or contains(up,          {{VALUE}})
>    or contains(up.up,       {{VALUE}})
>    or contains(up.up.up,    {{VALUE}})
>    or contains(up.up.up.up, {{VALUE}})
> SORT file.etags, up.up.up.up, up.up.up, up.up, up.file
> ```
